law.history: Repealed 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 4. -- Reenacted 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 2. -- Repealed 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 112-5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Employment of other counsel by state officers and agencies.
